RESTORATION AND POLISHING OF PARQUET

Experienced craftsmen use professional equipment and environmentally friendly materials

PARQUET SERVICE

Everyone sooner or later faces the question of choosing a floor covering. And of course, it is better to use new materials for room arrangement. But sometimes, the old parquet can still serve faithfully for many years. In this case, parquet restoration is exactly what will give your floor a new life. If you have chosen new parquet or parquet board, we will also be helpful. Now more about this and thatâ€¦

HOW TO ORDER

Stage 1
Agreement

Result:
Agreed terms of cooperation, deadlines, and cost of work

Begins with your request for services. Your wishes and requirements for the work are taken into account. If necessary, a master visits the object for inspection. Formation and submission of proposals

Stage 2
Execution of Works

Result:
Execution of works to achieve the expected result

Works are carried out according to approved quality parameters. The customer monitors the quality of work and materials used

Stage 3
Completion

Result:
Obtaining expected results of work within agreed deadlines

At this stage, the parties carry out final work, hand over/accept the object, and settle accounts

PARQUET RESTORATION COST

Parquet Restoration

comprehensive

from 140 UAH / sqm

includes
sanding, puttying, 3-layer varnishing

Sanding

from 60 UAH / sqm

performed
with a drum sanding machine

Polishing

from 40 UAH / sqm

performed
with a disk polishing machine

Additional Services

  • Applying varnish
  • Crack filling
  • Skirting board installation

Installation

  • Laminate and plywood
  • Parquet and parquet board

Minimum order - from 20* sqm.

* if the order volume is less than 20 sqm. -
the cost and conditions are negotiated separately

Specify the Price

The best way to determine the cost of work is to consult with our specialists for consultation and estimation. You may also find it helpful to receive advice on material selection. We provide all consultations, advice, and estimates FOR FREE

About us

Parquet works in Kyiv and the Kyiv region is our main specialization. We perform old floor covering repair with the highest quality, to the point that you won't recognize it.
